summary: A counterterrorism specialist is assigned by the President to track down a terrorist who is suspected of planning to set off a nuclear device in the U.S.
cast: Chuck Norris|Judson Mills|Jennifer Tung|Roxanne Hart|Joel Swetow|Ali Afshar|Thom Barry|Bruce Nozick|Maz Jobrani|Kay Bailey Hutchison|Philip Casnoff|Robert Urich|Chino Binamo|Dameon Clarke|Dan Flannery|Jeff Grays|Sean Hennigan|James Huston|Brett Rice|Jordan Wall|Jack Watkins|Michael Bendall|Brian Dakota|Terry L. Harris|Rosa Nichols|Maggie Parks|Bill Poague|Tom Powell|Harout Yerganian
title: El hombre del presidente 2
